title: Mindy Kaling Hulu Comedy Series ‘Not Suitable for Work’ Adds 12 Recurring Guest Stars
summary: Mindy Kaling’s upcoming Hulu comedy show “Not Suitable for Work” has added a dozen actors to its cast in recurring guest star roles. Variety has learned that the following people have joined the show: Victor Garber (“Alias,” “Titanic”), Greg Germann (“Grey’s Anatomy,” “57 Seconds”), Judy Gold (“Bet…

title: Amazon’s grocery store dreams are reshaping Whole Foods
summary: Customers at a Pennsylvania Whole Foods can order Kraft Mac & Cheese while they shop. | Image: Amazon Amazon built a portal to Kraft Mac & Cheese, Goldfish crackers, and Nestlé Drumsticks inside one of its Whole Foods stores — and it plans to do the same at others.
